subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – a person combing their hair; [[obedient]].

subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=ruò
|c=joek6
|h=pfs=na/ngiâ
|h_note=na - vernacular (“if”); ngiâ - literary
|md=nâ/iŏk
|md_note=nâ - vernacular (“if”); iŏk - literary
|mn=ná/xm,zz,tw:nā/qz:nǎ/xm,qz,tp:lio̍k/kh:jio̍k/zz:jia̍k
|mn_note=ná - vernacular (“like; as if”); nā/nǎ - vernacular (“if”); lio̍k/jio̍k/jia̍k - literary
|mn-t=riag8/riêh8/rioh8
|mn-t_note=riag8 - literary ("if", “like; as if”); riêh8/rioh8 - vernacular (dialectal usage - "how much", "so" (那麼)) (riêh8 - Chaozhou)

|w=5zaq
|mc=3
|oc=1+2,3
|cat=a,v,pron,con,pn
}}

subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|わか}}

# "[[my]] [[lord]]" (towards a young [[master]] or a young [[heir]])
